Author: Caraxi
Name: Simple Tweaks Plugin
Description:
A collection of Quality of Life tweaks. Aiming to improve the experience without changing anything drastically.
All changes are toggleable, with everything disabled by default. Visit the Repo for a full list of tweaks. (Globe icon below)\
Punchline: This was supposed to be simple...
Changelog:
1.6.6.0
- [Hide Mouse After Inactivity] Fixed showing gamepad cursor when hiding mouse.
- [Chat Name Colour] Added colour picker instead of number input.
- [Large Cooldown Counter] Removed Simple Mode
- [Custom Free Company Tags] Italic Support
- [Custom Free Company Tags] Allow for any icon.
- [Adjust Equipment Positions] Fixed position of glamour error icons.
- [Fix Target] Fix bug causing tweak to attempt targeting untargetable objects.
- [Auto Open Loot Window] Fixed loot window opening during cutscenes.
- New Experimental Tweak: Character Window Job Switcher - Click jobs in the Character window to switch.
- New Tweak: Show Process ID Command
- New Tweak: Duplicate Keybind Hints Between Hotbars
